body.p: Management Console consists of the following tabs that allow you to interact with your process instances and data:

ul.li: Process Instances: Use this tab to find process and subprocess instances by status or business key
Jobs: Use this tab to view a list of available jobs to filter jobs by status and perform actions for individual jobs, such as view details, reschedule, or cancel.

body.p: In this example, the Management Console displays data for the kogito-travel-agency extended example application in the list of example applications.
